thread.title: Pence condemns vandalism at Jewish cemetery
thread.title_full: Pence condemns vandalism at Jewish cemetery

author: AP
title: Pence condemns vandalism at Jewish cemetery
text: Pence condemns vandalism at Jewish cemetery Vice President Mike Pence visited a suburban St. Louis Jewish cemetery where more than 150 headstones were damaged earlier this week. (Feb. 22) Post to Facebook Pence condemns vandalism at Jewish cemetery Vice President Mike Pence visited a suburban St. Louis Jewish cemetery where more than 150 headstones were damaged earlier this week.
